attributes.action: make mobile network operators responsible for all costs charged to their customers accounts, and allowing the customer to reclaim any costs added to their bill without the customers consent directly from the operator.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more mobile phones are seen as a new method to avoid carrying cash. Whilst there is protection from the banks for credit cards that are used fraudulently, or mistakenly, there is absolutely no protection for you if your mobile phone account is debited either by mistake or with a deliberate reason to defraud or steal. Banks are responsible for the charges on your credit card and bank account. In a similar way network operators need to be made responsible for costs charged to your account, which are ultimately debited to your bank account, as too often it is impossible to identify who these companies actually are, to be able to recover the money.
